about.details:
Incorporated in 2012, Kolkata based Supershakti Metaliks Limited is a company engaged in the business of providing diversified products of steel. The company forms part of Sai Group which has carved itself into a well-known group and established it's goodwill in the iron and steel manufacturing industry. The company's manufacturing plant is located in Durgapur.

The Company enjoys a wide product range with diverse applications across downstream sectors. It possesses multiple manufacturing processes within the Plant with the ability to address customer orders with shrinking turnaround time. The Company has the widest range of products enabling it to cater to a wide spectrum of applications across the industries and balancing it out from market volatilities.

The company has 376 employees on its payroll.

faqs.question: What is the Supershakti Metaliks IPO?
faqs.answer:
Supershakti Metaliks IPO is a SME IPO of 1600200 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹60.01 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹375 per share. The minimum order quantity is 300.

The IPO opens on July 17, 2018, and closes on July 20, 2018.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Supershakti Metaliks IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Supershakti Metaliks IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Supershakti Metaliks IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Supershakti Metaliks IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Supershakti Metaliks IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Supershakti Metaliks IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Supershakti Metaliks IPO opens on July 17, 2018 and closes on July 20, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Supershakti Metaliks IPO?
faqs.answer: Supershakti Metaliks IPO lot size is 300, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,12,500.

faqs.question: How to apply for Supershakti Metaliks IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Supershakti Metaliks IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Supershakti Metaliks IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Supershakti Metaliks IPO will be done on Wednesday, July 25, 2018, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, July 27, 2018. Check the Supershakti Metaliks IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Supershakti Metaliks IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Supershakti Metaliks IPO listing date is on Monday, July 30, 2018.
